# customActions

**Instance Property**

Custom document browser actions.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var customActions: [UIDocumentBrowserAction] { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property contains an empty array. Assign an array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentBrowserAction] objects to add custom document browser actions.

Document browser actions can be accessed in two ways:

- *Navigation bar* actions appear in the Navigation bar when the user places the browser into the Select mode.
- *Menu* actions appear when the user long presses on a document or folder.

When triggered, these actions are passed the URLs of the currently selected items.

## Adding custom actions

- **UIDocumentBrowserAction**: A custom action that you can create and add to a document browser’s Edit menu or navigation bar.
